name: Protein Powder
description: Protein Powder improves muscle recovery and boosts energy. Recommended usage: 1 scoop daily.
details: Instructions: Mix one scoop with 200ml water. Consume post-workout. Avoid exceeding daily dosage.

name: Dumbbell Set
description: Dumbbells perfect for strength training and toning. Adjustable weights included.
details: Instructions: Use according to weight level and fitness plan. Store safely after use.

name: Yoga Mat
description: High-quality non-slip yoga mat for daily practice and stretching.
details: Care Instructions: Clean with damp cloth. Roll and store in a dry place.

name: Resistance Bands
description: Set of resistance bands for strength and mobility exercises.
details: Instructions: Follow exercise guide included. Do not overstretch bands.
